Name: Ylands
About the game: Adventure awaits you in the world of Ylands! Play with friends, gather resources, build anything and everything, explore the lands. Build a ship and sail between six unique biomes. Encounter mythical animals, a wide variety of sea-life, special Mystery ylands, dozens of Random Encounters and much more! Key features Explore Six unique biomes with characteristic resources in each. Ocean biotopes populated by sharks, fish and other sea-life. Sail between ylands to discover a variety of Random Encounters. Craft & Build Gather resources to craft tools, weapons, workstations, clothes, armor, decorations and more! Build your own ship to travel around the vast world of Ylands. Find an yland you like and build your home. Experience Relaxed ambient atmosphere of the stunning low-poly world of Ylands. Mystery ylands - special story ylands with puzzles, fights or dungeons. Multiplayer features you can enjoy with your friends... ... and much, much more! Game Modes Adventure - The main game mode that you can enjoy with friends or on your own. The core game, where you can explore the world, gather resources to craft and build, sail between biomes and more! Get the Exploration DLC in our in-game store to enjoy the full potential of Ylands. Creative Mode - Have all the resources available to you so that you can delve into the almost limitless possibilities of the visually stunning world of Ylands. Community Games - Games built by our talented creators using the powerful Editor tool. Editor - Create fun custom games or build intricate blueprints of ships and other structures and bring them to life with Visual Scripting. Ylands on Mobile - Ylands is available on mobile devices as well. Check out your mobile store! Made by Bohemia Interactive Ylands is made by Bohemia Interactive in the Unity 3D engine. Bohemia Interactive is a Czech gaming studio known for the Arma series, DayZ and Vigor.
